definition: to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax

sentences.english: Some years ago, a good family moved into the third floor apartment of the tenement where we lived in the Bronx.
sentences.chinese: 多年前，我们住在布朗克斯时，三楼搬来一家新租户。

sentences.english: Tenants share the operating system and servers.
sentences.chinese: 租户共享操作系统和服务器。

sentences.english: Why Should Landlords Require Tenants to Have Renter's Insurance?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要房东要求租户有承租人的保险？。

sentences.english: Size. The massing of the center, including both anchor tenants and other tenants.
sentences.chinese: 大的中心包括锚店和其它租户。

sentences.english: Do you want to know the promotion actions of our commerical tenants?
sentences.chinese: 你想知道商业区租户的最新优惠活动吗？

sentences.english: These tasks have to be conducted separately on each tenant’s infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 必须在每个租户的基础结构上单独地执行这些任务。

sentences.english: You will become the first user for the tenant and the default account administrator.
sentences.chinese: 您将变成该租户的第一个用户和默认的帐户管理员。

sentences.english: No. 8 Financial St., by contrast, has a new tenant.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，金融街8号却迎来了一个新租户。

sentences.english: Others suggested renters might have to wait longer.
sentences.chinese: 其他人建议租户必须等待的更久。

sentences.english: Anchor Ratios. The mix of anchor and non-anchor tenants, including in-line retail tenants.
sentences.chinese: 锚店与非锚店租户的组合，包括线内零售租户。

sentences.english: Anchor Ratios. The mix of anchor and non-anchor tenants, including in-line retail tenants.
sentences.chinese: 锚店与非锚店租户的组合，包括线内零售租户。

sentences.english: Some tenants come short of a desirable standard in housekeeping and tidiness.
sentences.chinese: 一些租户在内务和整洁方面缺乏可取的标准。

sentences.english: We will introduce the multi-tenant design patterns for several kinds of primary sharing resources.
sentences.chinese: 我们将介绍几种主要共享资源的多租户设计模式。

sentences.english: The lessee can be evicted for non-payment of rent.
sentences.chinese: 租户不付租金，对方可把他逐出租地。

sentences.english: There are underground single-level car parkings made for tenants of the house.
sentences.chinese: 而且还有单层地下停车场可以供租户使用。

sentences.english: The number of tenants renting privately has increased by nearly one million in the past five years.
sentences.chinese: 在最近五年，租用私房的租户人数增加了近百万。

definition: property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
property management/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3]
borrower/leaser/the hiring side of a contract
(of a landlord) to rent out one or more parts of a property/(of a tenant) to sublet one or more parts of a property/(agriculture) sharecropping
rent for a room or house
